ğ—•ğ˜‚ğ—±ğ—´ğ—²ğ˜ ğ—™ğ—¼ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—°ğ—®ğ˜€ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ—–ğ—¿ğ—²ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—² ğ—šğ—²ğ—»ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»:
â€¢ Revamped a time series forecasting model for 1.5 million parameters, improving overall MAPE by 45% and reducing SSE by 35%. Enhanced holiday prediction accuracy by 60%, and implemented Pandas UDF parallel processing on Amazon EMR, optimizing the model runtime by 94% and lowering monthly operational costs by $1,000.
â€¢ Automated Ad creative generation, reducing the workload of 1.5 designers saving 150K USD annually and minimizing the creative generation time by 70%. Utilized technologies including Large Language Models for text suggestions, DALL-E for image generation, OCR for text detection, sentiment analysis, and Streamlit for UI.

ğ—”ğ˜‚ğ—±ğ—¶ğ—²ğ—»ğ—°ğ—² ğ—¥ğ—²ğ—°ğ—¼ğ—ºğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ—±ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—®ğ—»ğ—± ğ—–ğ—¼ğ˜€ğ˜ ğ—¢ğ—½ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—ºğ—¶ğ˜‡ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—» ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ— ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¸ğ—²ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—»ğ—´ ğ—–ğ—®ğ—ºğ—½ğ—®ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—»ğ˜€:
â€¢ Architected a data science solution leveraging machine learning, statistics, and bandit algorithms for campaign optimization, resulting in a 200% boost in ROAS and a 40% increase in combined organic and marketing-driven sales.
â€¢ Scaled the solution for North American region for 10 different brands on Amazon and Tiktok, incrementing average ROAS by 150%, while increasing average combined sales by 30% and average weekly CPA by 52%.
â€¢ Coordinated with cross functional teams to design and construct a tool for the solution.

positions.subtitle: Sigmoid
positions.description: ğ—¥ğ—²ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—»ğ˜‚ğ—² ğ—šğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ˜ğ—µ ğ— ğ—®ğ—»ğ—®ğ—´ğ—²ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ ğ— ğ—¼ğ—±ğ—²ğ—¹:â€¢ Created Revenue Econometrics and Promo Pattern Recognition Models, leading to improved sales forecasting accuracy and efficiency, and devised an automated recommendation tool to enhance decision-making processes.â€¢ Automated the process of pricing analysis & promo strategy planning, cutting down the decision making time from 3 days to 3.5 hrs.â€¢ Applied ML techniques such as XGBoost regression, loess, hierarchical linear models at retailer-ppg-week level using Pyspark, R and Julia and obtained a MAPE of 16% and Rsq scores of 0.76 and 0.84 for econometrics and promotions respectively with coverage of 70% retailers.ğ—šğ—²ğ—»ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ˜ƒğ—² ğ—”ğ—œ ğ—³ğ—¼ğ—¿ ğ—§ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—±ğ—² ğ—£ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—ºğ—¼ ğ—¢ğ—½ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—ºğ—¶ğ˜€ğ—®ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—¼ğ—»:â€¢ Engineered Trade Promo optimisation model with RGM approach, followed by utilising conversational AI to generate the key insights on Streamlit.â€¢ Fine-tuned LLMs, and GANs to uncover hidden patterns, generate synthetic promo scenarios, and achieve personalized insights via conversational AI, resulting in a 45% reduction in analysis time.
positions.title: Associate Data Scientist
positions.description_html:
ğ—¥ğ—²ğ˜ƒğ—²ğ—»ğ˜‚ğ—² ğ—šğ—¿ğ—¼ğ˜„ğ˜ğ—µ ğ— ğ—®ğ—»ğ—®ğ—´ğ—²ğ—ºğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ ğ— ğ—¼ğ—±ğ—²ğ—¹:
â€¢ Created Revenue Econometrics and Promo Pattern Recognition Models, leading to improved sales forecasting accuracy and efficiency, and devised an automated recommendation tool to enhance decision-making processes.
â€¢ Automated the process of pricing analysis & promo strategy planning, cutting down the decision making time from 3 days to 3.5 hrs.
â€¢ Applied ML techniques such as XGBoost regression, loess, hierarchical linear models at retailer-ppg-week level using Pyspark, R and Julia and obtained a MAPE of 16% and Rsq scores of 0.76 and 0.84 for econometrics and promotions respectively with coverage of 70% retailers.

â€¢ Fine-tuned LLMs, and GANs to uncover hidden patterns, generate synthetic promo scenarios, and achieve personalized insights via conversational AI, resulting in a 45% reduction in analysis time.

projects: [{"title":"Customer Churn Prediction using Logit Leaf and Multi time-slice forecasting ( under Prof.J.K Jha, I.I.T Kgp)","start_date":"Sep 2021","end_date":"May 2022","description":"â€¢ Churn prediction is the probability measure of loss of a particular client or customer from a company in the future.â€¢ Developed an unique pipeline approach by training the dataset using Multi Time Slice Forecasting method with multiple time slices to overcome the issues that might occur due to label imbalance or overfitting, since the method uses more training samples from different time slices.â€¢ Developed a prediction model using the Logit Leaf Model algorithm that is an implementation of Decision Trees followed by Logistic Regression, thereby compensating the drawbacks of respective algorithms."},{"title":"Credit Card Fraud Detector Project (ref. Kaggle)","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Aug 2020","description":"â€¢ Predicted if a given test transaction is fraudulent or not from an imbalanced dataset consisting of 284,807 transactions using Python.â€¢ Taken care of the errors that might occur due to imbalance using Under Sampling, Over Sampling methods.â€¢ Found out that SVC algorithm to be best suitable with an accuracy score of 76.28%."},{"title":"Health State Estimation of Pump using Machine Learning (under Prof.A. Kumar, I.I.T Kgp)","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"â€¢ Developed a mathematical model using Python to predict the next failure of the water pump which has a time sequence raw data of 52 sensors.â€¢ Applied various Data Science techniques and Machine Learning algorithms to refine the Dataset.â€¢ Found out that HMM(Hidden Markov Model) algorithm to be best suitable with an accuracy score of 81.76%."}]
